channel.title: Bar Graph on blog650
channel.description: Recent content in Bar Graph on blog650

item.title: histogram
item.description: How to use a histogram to display selected Lahman baseball database statistics First, install packages: Lahman, dplyr, and ggplot2. Then bring them in with libary: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) In this example, we extract player weights from the Lahman baseball database.
